DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Study Approved Document Sent Steering Committee Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date the approved document was sent to the Steering Committee.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Study Approved Document Sent Steering Committee
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information pertaining to a writing that contains information about research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, mechanism of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiology, behavior and health services research and the approval conveyed or transmitted to the committee that arrange the priorities or order of business for an organization.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, mechanism of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiology, behavior and health services research. :Approved; established by authority; given authoritative approval.:An organized collection of records that describe a particular body of data.

Concepts.definition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.
Acceptance as satisfactory by an authoritative body; established by authority; given authoritative approval.
An organized collection of records that describe a particular body of data.

Property.preferredDefinition: Caused or enabled to go or be conveyed or transmitted.:A committee to arrange the priorities or order of business for an organization.

Concepts.definition: Cause or enable to go or be conveyed or transmitted.
A committee to arrange the priorities or order of business for an organization.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
